alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 7:58PM CDT until June 16 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 758 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Enterprise, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elba, Enterprise, Samson, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Chancellor, Perry Store, Lucile, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Central City, Goodman, Basin, Enterprise Municipal A/P, Spears, Pera, Alberton, Weeks, Sellersville and Highfalls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
